# Daily Log - December 3, 2025**Employee**: EMP-88853 Artem Skichko**Date**: 2025-12-03**Day**: Wednesday---## Chronological Activities### Morning Session (8:00-12:30)#### 8:00-9:00 - Project Startup Issues- **Issue**: Backend failing to start - "Permission denied for port 3001"- **Action**: Investigated port conflicts, multiple ports (3001, 1489, 3002, 5000) were occupied- **Solution**: Implemented automatic port selection in `src/app.ts` with fallback ports (5000, 8000, 3000, 4000, 5001, 8001)- **Result**: Backend successfully started on port 8000- **Files Modified**: `upload_crms/src/app.ts`, `upload_crms/.env`, `upload_crms/client/vite.config.js`, `upload_crms/client/.env`#### 9:00-10:00 - OAuth Authentication Errors- **Issue**: Authentication Error - Request failed with status code 500- **Action**: Analyzed API Gateway configuration and Vite proxy setup- **Solution**: Changed `VITE_API_GATEWAY_URL` from full URL to relative path `/api` to use Vite proxy- **Result**: Requests now properly routed through Vite proxy, avoiding CORS issues- **Files Modified**: `upload_crms/client/vite.config.js`, `upload_crms/client/.env`#### 10:00-11:00 - OAuth Exchange Token Issues- **Issue**: `/api/auth/exchange-token` endpoint returning 500 errors- **Action**: Added detailed logging in API Gateway, analyzed error patterns- **Solution**: Made `exchange-token` optional - OAuth callback continues with access token if exchange fails- **Result**: Users can now log in even if exchange-token endpoint is unavailable- **Files Modified**: `upload_crms/client/src/services/auth.js`, `upload_crms/client/src/pages/OAuthCallback.jsx`, `api-gateway/src/routes/auth.routes.js`#### 11:00-12:30 - Performance Optimization- **Goal**: Improve frontend performance for large media libraries- **Actions**:  - Implemented chunked upload optimization with retry logic (3 attempts, exponential backoff)  - Added parallel chunk upload (up to 3 simultaneously)  - Created `LazyAssetItem` component with IntersectionObserver for lazy loading  - Optimized `AssetItem` with better blob URL caching and cleanup  - Added `useCallback` hooks in `MediaLibrary` to prevent unnecessary re-renders- **Result**: Improved performance for large file uploads and media library browsing- **Files Modified**:   - `upload_crms/client/src/services/api.js`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/LazyAssetItem.jsx` (new)  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/MediaLibrary.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/AssetItem.jsx`#### 12:00-12:30 - Blob URL Error Fix- **Issue**: `ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND` when navigating from video page to main page- **Action**: Removed blob URL storage from localStorage, improved cleanup logic- **Solution**: Added error handling with automatic fallback to original file URLs- **Result**: No more file not found errors when navigating between pages- **Files Modified**:   - `upload_crms/client/src/components/InteractiveVideo/InteractiveVideoPlayer.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/AssetItem.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/pages/AssetDetailPage.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/EditAssetModal.jsx`---### Afternoon Session (13:30-17:00)#### 13:30-14:30 - Connection Error Handling- **Issue**: Multiple `ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED` errors on page load- **Action**: Implemented health check endpoint and retry logic- **Solution**:   - Added `/health` endpoint on backend  - Created `checkBackendHealth` function with retry mechanism  - Added connection error UI with retry button and troubleshooting steps- **Result**: Better error handling and user feedback for connection issues- **Files Modified**:   - `upload_crms/src/app.ts`  - `upload_crms/client/src/services/api.js`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/MediaLibrary.jsx`#### 14:30-15:30 - YouTube-Style Optimization Implementation- **Goal**: Implement YouTube-like architecture for media library- **Actions**:  - Created backend thumbnail endpoint `/public/uploads/thumbnails/:thumbnailName` with aggressive caching (1 year, immutable)  - Implemented thumbnail-first approach in `AssetItem` component  - Added hover video preview (loads after 300ms delay)  - Created loading skeletons for thumbnails  - Added duration badges and play icon overlays- **Result**: Significantly reduced initial load time (from 96 requests/17.5MB to ~20-30 requests/2-3MB)- **Files Modified**:   - `upload_crms/src/controllers/uploads.ts`  - `upload_crms/src/routes/uploads.ts`  - `upload_crms/src/models/Asset.ts`  - `upload_crms/client/src/services/api.js`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/AssetItem.jsx`#### 15:30-16:00 - Infinite Scroll Implementation- **Goal**: Implement infinite scroll for better performance with large libraries- **Action**: Added pagination (20 items per page) with IntersectionObserver for automatic loading- **Result**: Faster initial load, better UX for large media libraries- **Note**: Attempted virtual scrolling with `react-window` but reverted due to import errors, using regular grid with infinite scroll instead- **Files Modified**: `upload_crms/client/src/components/MediaLibrary.jsx`#### 16:00-16:30 - YouTube-Style Video Card Redesign- **Goal**: Redesign video preview cards to match YouTube style- **Actions**:  - Changed layout to horizontal (landscape) with aspect-video  - Added dark gradient overlay for text readability  - Moved text content below thumbnail (after initial overlay design)  - Removed borders from cards  - Added hover effects (scale, translateY)  - Implemented minimal design (title, author, date only)- **Result**: Modern, clean YouTube-like appearance- **Files Modified**: `upload_crms/client/src/components/AssetItem.jsx`#### 16:30-17:00 - UI/UX Improvements- **Actions**:  - Replaced "Loading..." text with animated spinners  - Removed spinner backgrounds for minimalist look  - Fixed comment counting for transcript segments (only count comments with `displayOnVideo: true`)  - Improved authentication error handling (prevent false logouts on network errors)  - Created `CustomVideoControls` component with integrated transcript markers  - Enhanced transcript marker visibility (thicker, always visible, with shadows)  - Implemented smooth scrolling to top when clicking transcript timestamps  - Created `VideoCardMenu` component with three-dots action menu  - Fixed dropdown menu z-index issues using React Portals- **Result**: Improved user experience with better visual feedback and interactions- **Files Modified**:   - `upload_crms/client/src/components/MediaLibrary.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/AssetItem.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/InteractiveVideo/InteractiveVideoPlayer.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/InteractiveVideo/CustomVideoControls.jsx` (new)  - `upload_crms/client/src/components/VideoCardMenu.jsx` (new)  - `upload_crms/client/src/hooks/useAuth.jsx`  - `upload_crms/client/src/index.css`---## Time Summary- **Morning Session**: ~4.5 hours (8:00-12:30)- **Afternoon Session**: ~3.5 hours (13:30-17:00)- **Total**: ~8 hours---**Last Updated**: 2025-12-03

03.12.25Project Spares Nordic - full time I continued to work with the TVC order E25100200185. Performed tasks related to the publication of the products in the Spares Manager system: adding names and descriptions of the products in English, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Danish and German, images, categories, and other characteristics, also made calculations and added prices in 4 currencies (Euro, Swedish, Danish and Norwegian krone) for B2C and B2B.

Checked all LinkedIn accounts, sent first messages and follow-ups, updated CRM statuses, and sent a reminder for a scheduled call. Supported Lead Generation managers with CRM tasks, lead search, and call coordination with Sales.Coordinated Google Maps workflow changes with Cynthia, provided guidance on outreach and communication, and completed file organization in Dropbox with updated WhisperFlow documentation. Verified companies and leads, added relevant contacts to CRM, and sent connection requests.

Restarted Old Connections outreach, tested Gemini AI for first message generation, resolved a temporary AI issue, and continued monitoring replies. Assisted with a Zoom issue for a UK client call and resolved duplicate lead and company records in CRM.

1️⃣ Completed Tasks


Continued working on the dashboard heatmap component.


Decided to revert to the previous heatmap library because the new one looked worse and was harder to customize.


Achieved full-size rendering: all 7 days now display properly.


Updated the color scheme.


Expanded the visible range from 6 months to 12 months.


Increased the overall size of the heatmap and added year-switching functionality at the top.


Fixed the entire dashboard after Claude Code Extension broke multiple files and caused the site to stop rendering.

Challenge: The new heatmap library looked worse and offered less flexibility.
Solution: Rolled back to the original library and customized it manually to match the requirements.


Challenge: Claude Code Extension introduced breaking changes that completely broke the site.
Solution: Spent significant time debugging, reverting changes, and restoring all functional components.

Continue refining UI for the Overview and Calendar pages.

Що зроблено: реалізувала TextField (outlined/filled/standard, стани focus/error/success/disabled/read-only, слоти label/prefix/suffix/helper/counter), підв’язала a11y (aria-describedby, aria-invalid, id-лінки через helper). Провела першу інтеграцію в Vite/ESM мікросервіс: рендер ок, типи резолвляться, bundle +6.1 KB gzipped, але стилі підтягуються тільки через явний import '@ui-kit/dist/index.css'.Інсайти:Дзеркалити API Material UI зручно для девелоперів, але залишати власні легкі стилі.A11y треба вшивати одразу (ids, aria), інакше потім боляче.CSS доставка — критична: ESM без стилів не дає цінності.День вийшов насиченим (research → build → інтеграція → debug) — розбивання на дрібні шматки допомагає.Ризики:Стилі не автопідтягуються в consumer → потрібен side-effect export або документація.Роз’їзд токенів теми між бібліотекою і мікросервісом.Валідація: не покриті async/server помилки.План на завтра (розбито на шматки, щоб не зависати):Packaging/styles: додати side-effect CSS export; прогнати установку через локальний реєстр/npm link.Theming: описати контракт токенів; зробити бренд-override у мікросервісі; перевірити, що TextField + Button не ламаються.Validation demos: сторінка з success/error/disabled/read-only + async error; перевірити, що helper/counter не смикають лейаут.Docs: короткий інтеграційний гайд + список підводних каменів.

Продовжив працювати над оновленням структури вкладок моніторингу керування пристроями, завершив вкладки провідності, кислотності та помутніння

Today I processed incoming messages in the messenger and responded to candidates on the job site. Additionally, I reviewed previous onboarding sessions with the goal of preparing a new universal format, which is planned to be worked on throughout December. I also updated current vacancies for the website, formed candidate lists for upcoming interviews, and sent invitations to participate.

### **Daily Report****Key Result: The team's work environment was prepared, a key CRM integration issue was resolved, and the HR tool received an important functional update.**Today was focused on finalizing existing projects and solving complex technical challenges, significantly increasing the usability and reliability of the developed tools.**Key Achievements:**1. **Prepared and automated the work environment for the Google Maps project:*** A "clean" work environment was set up and prepared specifically for the lead generation team – a new final sheet was created in the spreadsheet, specifically for their work.* **Key integration issue resolved:** Automation was set up that compares companies with CRM records in the background and marks matches. This is a critical improvement that saves the team time and prevents duplicates.2. **Work has begun on resolving the main scraper stability issue:*** Active work has begun on the **main technical issue** of the project – unstable search for the "Reviews" tab in Selenium due to **constant changes in the Google page structure**. This is a priority task to improve the reliability of the entire pipeline.3. **The HR tool has received a significant update:*** The HR extension (bookmarklet) has been **significantly improved.*** The tool now doesn't just transfer files, but **automatically converts them to PDF format** and **neatly stores them in a separate, dedicated Dropbox folder**, making the entire process much more organized and convenient for the team.**Results:**The day was very productive. A user-friendly and, importantly, CRM-integrated work environment has been created for the lead generation team. Work has begun on fixing the last major technical issue in the scraper. In parallel with this, the tool for the HR department was brought to its final, “industrial” form.

Completed multilingual marketing deliverables for presale employee and provided strategic design consultation. Resolved operational blockers related to AI tool access. MAIN_PROMPT Version Migration (7.1 → 7.2)- Identified release of MAIN_PROMPT v7.2 during training session- Proactively updated all training materials and examples to reference v7.2- Educated designers on version differences and improvements- Updated prompt template syntax for v7.2 compatibility- Ensured department adopts latest tooling immediately- Demonstrated continuous improvement and staying current with tools**Strategic Impact**: Department remains on cutting edge of available automation capabilities### 3. Strategic Design Consultation- Provided in-depth design critique for Eleonora Safonova's email newsletter concepts- Identified key improvement areas: visual hierarchy, attention capture, CTA prominence- Recommended AI-assisted design improvement approach- Guided integration of AI tools into design workflow- Established iterative improvement process with clear next steps- Demonstrated leadership in design quality and AI integration**Strategic Impact**: Elevated design quality and accelerated AI adoption in design process### 5. Operational Problem Solving- Coordinated resolution of Claude AI token exhaustion across design team- Worked with accounting to manage subscription capacity- Identified alternative account (contact FVE) with available tokens- Ensured team continuity while long-term solution implemented- Demonstrated cross-functional coordination and proactive problem resolution**Strategic Impact**: Maintained team productivity during infrastructure challenge### 6.
